TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
DAMNIT!

OT: I wish prof. Endwalker wasn't a sneaky ninja.

Edit: and RIC neither!
Tempted to delete the post as it doesn't meet the game's rules.
Don't please don't!!! It does cause I answered the wish

No worries, I knew you were post squatting while you edited. Congrats on the 10k.

/returns the thread to topic

You wish to return the thread to topic?

Granted. For 5 seconds. Then the proffessional derailers arrive.

I wish I could delete posts.

Granted. You can, but only your own (it's true!).

I wish for more bananas.

Granted. Every poster is now Vanamonde.

I wish for one of my meaningful posts to get rep'd so I can get the 5 rep I need for my next bar (been waiting since the weekend )

granted, but you get negative rep instead of positive rep.

i wish for positive rep

Then move to a different sub-forum please.

I wish I could own a copy of Super-R-Type. I want to make myself angry.

Granted! you shall own a photograph of the disk, and laugh forever on it.

I wish I can be Einstein.

Okay, you're a stone.

I wish for a pane of glass.

Granted, but the pane of glass causes you lots of pain. Wew! Look at me! I'm a comedian!!

I wish appliances used wireless electricity.

Granted. You accidentally ship your power unit far away. The excessively large induction field destroys the earth.

I wish for an eternal clown.

Granted. He lives forever, and when you die, he stalks your grave, scaring your family away from your funeral.

I wish for a real life Laythe to orbit earth. It's smaller than the moon, so it shouldn't be to destructive.

Granted. 30 km altitude. Doesn't stay there too long...

I wish that google turns evil.

Granted, Your history (Including the "deleted" one) is leaked... to pretty much everyone.

Yes... EVERYTHING is known now. Lifes are ruined.

I wish for Gogolplex (Did I spell that right?)

Granted: You get a gogolplex of dysentary amoeba....

I wish for a B-17 Flying Fortress....

(I really wished on a star for one when I was a small child... my favorite TV show was Twelve O'Clock High )

Edited March 25, 2015 by Rematog

Granted. All four engines fail shortly after your first takeoff.

I wish for better space station.

Edited March 25, 2015 by InterCity
Grammar error.

Granted. Your space station is so fantastic that it is confiscated by the government for official use.

I wish KSP was even more fantastic. (Is that possible?)

Granted. Everyone has different ideas on what counts as "more fantastic", usually contradicting each other, and they all get implemented. Needless to say, this breaks the game horribly.

I wish for a nice trip to the mountains. (and get creative - I don't want to end up with just a broken leg )

Granted: You have the most amazing trip to the Mountains of the Mun..... and have to wait for Jeb to rescue you... and you DO need life-support.

I wish I got paid for overtime....

Edited March 25, 2015 by Rematog
Forgot to add my wish....

Granted. You are paid with work experience. (Woo! Hoo!)

I wish I could communicate with animals.

Granted. They continuously badmouth you and bully you.

I wish I was a flying whale.

Granted. you get a flying whale that suddenly falls on your body.

I wish that i had butterbeer.

Granted. It tastes horrible.

I wish it was not so simple to ruin wishes.
